text: wajahidu fi l-lahi haqqa jihadihi huwa ij'tabakum wama jaʿala ʿalaykum fi l-dini min harajin millata abikum ib'rahima huwa sammakumu l-mus'limina min qablu wafi hadha liyakuna l-rasulu shahidan ʿalaykum watakunu shuhadaa ʿala l-nasi fa-aqimu l-salata waatu l-zakata wa-iʿ'tasimu bil-lahi huwa mawlakum faniʿ'ma l-mawla waniʿ'ma l-nasiru
